articles.author: Bailey Rahn
articles.text:
Another round of strains have been added to the Leafly Explorer as per your requests! We've highlighted five of our favorites, but there are plenty more to check out here. 
All right, you know what to do with these: indulge, rate, review, repeat!
   1. Conspiracy Kush
Characteristics of Conspiracy Kush:

70% indica
Cross between Obama Kush and Space Queen
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Tangy citrus aroma with a peppery aftertaste
Cerebral activity followed by relaxing effects

   2. Starfighter
Characteristics of Starfighter:

60/40 indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Alien Tahoe OG and Lemon Alien Dawg
Breeder: Alien Genetics
Sweet citrus aroma
Potently uplifting effects

   3. Sour Jack
Characteristics of Sour Jack:

70% sativa
Cross between Sour Diesel and Jack Herer
Tropical, sweet aroma
Uplifting effects with a spark of energy
May help with fatigue and depression

   4. Aurora Borealis
Characteristics of Aurora Borealis:

75% indica
Cross between Northern Lights #10 with Skunk #1
Sweet, skunky aroma
May help with spasms, pain, and sleeplessness

   5. Marionberry Kush
Characteristics of Marionberry Kush:

60/40 indica-dominant hybrid
Cross between Raspberry Kush and Space Queen
Breeder: TGA Genetics
Passion fruit and raspberry aroma
Uplifting followed by relaxation
articles.title: New Strains Alert: Conspiracy Kush, Starfighter, Sour Jack, Aurora Borealis, and Marionberry Kush

description: Starfighter is a 60/40 indica-dominant hybrid whose combined obscurity and quality have garnered this strain quite the reputation among growers and connoisseurs alike. Bred by Alien Genetics, Starfighter mixes genetics from Alien Tahoe OG and Lemon Alien Dawg to create a sweetly aromatic, uplifting hybrid that boasts its potency with a sparkling coat of star-like trichomes. Although the original Starfighter genetics have been discontinued, Exotic Genetix have resurrected similar phenotypes in seed form.
descriptionPlain: Starfighter is a 60/40 indica-dominant hybrid whose combined obscurity and quality have garnered this strain quite the reputation among growers and connoisseurs alike. Bred by Alien Genetics, Starfighter mixes genetics from Alien Tahoe OG and Lemon Alien Dawg to create a sweetly aromatic, uplifting hybrid that boasts its potency with a sparkling coat of star-like trichomes. Although the original Starfighter genetics have been discontinued, Exotic Genetix have resurrected similar phenotypes in seed form.

highlightedReviews.text:
Alright guys, let's get right into it, this is one of those reviews that are only written when the writer has a really really good smoke, is overwhelmed by the pleasure of the experience of it, and is compelled to review it to share it, celebrate it and preserve it. So come along! Now, lettuce talk about the buds. They allllmost have purple. It was somewhat confusing, because the sample buds i was shown i swore had abundances purple... I think. But alas, the buds i was given at point of sale were perhaps from another part of the plant or grow or w/e etc, and showed only faint, faint traces of purple. Just some. But, BUT, Trichome, resin, density, smell, and aesthetics wise, these were proper, proper flowers. The buds are dense, healthy, wet, frosted, hairy, and potent. Upon smoke of a .5g, Raw paper and crutch joint, I noticed several things. Firstly, I was awestruck by the ease of break-up into the joint. When squeezed and palpitated, the buds burst into a fine, even silt that left your fingers snowing, and crackled very distinctly when drawn upon. This was a really, really premium smoke. Harvested sometime around early, early 2016, i would wager. Top marks to The Farm growers <3 And their employees! Bought from a truly nice dude and crew. 

Purchased in Boulder CO 2/16. Find, grow, and or smoke this, wherever you are, dear reader, and fellow toker.
Love it's sweet lemon aroma, heavy hitter no doubt one of my favorite strains right now 🔥🔥

name: Starfighter
